thread.title: Win Summer Fun themed prizes with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
thread.title_full: Win Summer Fun themed prizes with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Summer Fun themed prizes with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
text: Camping in the Forest – Terms & Conditions Prize entitles up to four people to 7 nights free camping at a Camping in the Forest site of their choice in August 2015. Dates subject to availability and not over a Bank Holiday. Pitch includes electric hook ups and will be either grass or hard standing depending on the unit. Dates of booking must be confirmed by a month after competition close date of 24th July 2015. All prizes are non-transferable and there are no cash alternatives available in place of the stated prize. The Promoter reserves the right to withdraw or amend the competition or these terms and conditions at any time. Entrants must be aged over 18 years old and be full UK residents It luggage – Terms & Conditions Prize will be sent through to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the competition closing date. No cash alternatives Prize non-transferable Longleat – Terms & Conditions Prize is for a 2 Adult and 2 Child All in One Day Ticket. Prize is valid for Longleat standard opening dates and times up to 3rd January 2016 -Visit www.longleat.co.uk for details. Not to be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion. Voucher to be given at point of purchase. Photocopies will not be accepted Not for resale. Voucher value of £0.0001 Longleat reserves the right to close to the public, withdraw any attraction, alter times, prices and events or services without notice. Prize is as stated and no cash alternative will be offered. Prize is non-transferable. No purchase necessary. Michelin – Terms & Conditions THE I-SPY BOOK SERIES, which includes: I-SPY BOOK SERIES Aircraft £2.50, Animals £2.50, At the Airport £2.50, At the Seaside £2.50, Bath £2.50, Birds £2.50, Book of Facts £2.50, Cambridge £2.50, Camping £2.50, Car Badges £2.50, Cars £2.50, Castles and Battles £2.50, Classic Cars £2.50, Cool Cars £2.50, Cotswolds £2.50, Creepy Crawlies £2.50, Dinosaurs £2.50, Dogs £2.50, Edinburgh £2.50, Every Vehicle on the road £2.50, Explore London £2.50, Flags £2.50, Football Grounds £2.50, 'Great' Britain £2.50, Green Britain £2.50, History £2.50, In the Countryside £2.50, In the Garden £2.50, In the Night Sky £2.50, In the Street £2.50, Isle of Wight £2.50, Kings and Queens £2.50, Lake District £2.50, London Transport £2.50, Minerals, Rocks and Fossils £2.50, Mini World Atlas £2.99, Modern Britain £2.50, Nature £2.50, On a Car Journey £2.50, On a Car Journey in France £2.50, On a Ferry £2.50, On a road trip £2.50, On a Train Journey £2.50, On the Motorway £2.50, On the Water £2.50, Oxford £2.50, Paris (dual language) £2.99, People and Places £2.50, Scottish Nature £2.50, Sports & Games £2.50, Trees £2.50, Wild Flowers £2.50, Working Vehicles £2.50, notebook £1.99 TOTAL: £142.96 Minimum age is 3+ for all products. Not suitable for children under 36 months. Prizes are non-transferable, non-negotiable and no cash alternatives will be offered. Prize will be sent to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the promotion closing date. We reserve the right to substitute the prize for another prize of equal value if the advertised product becomes unavailable. Studio8 – Terms & Conditions Open to UK residents only. One winner will be randomly selected from entries received. The winner will receive a unique discount code to use at www.studio-eight.com to the value of £250. The code can only be used once. Not redeemable in Studio 8 concessions. Prize is non-transferable. No cash or other alternatives. Table Table – Terms & Conditions Prize voucher will be sent to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the promotion closing date. Voucher has no expiry date. Kids Eat Free entitles one child a free meal (junior meals are excluded) when a full price adult meal is purchased at the same time. Offer is available Monday – Saturday before 5pm. Follow @telegraph
